meanings.definition: The bottom horizontal member of a wall or building to which vertical members are attached.
meanings.sent1: The construction workers secured the wooden soleplates to the foundation.
meanings.sent2: The soleplates of the house were firmly anchored to the concrete base.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to use the soleplates as a balance beam.
meanings.sent4: The soleplates held the structure together like a sturdy glue.
meanings.sent5: I could feel the weight of the entire building resting on the soleplates.
